summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of a portion of Lots 13, 14, 17, 18, 19, 20 and 21, Berkeley Heights; and a portion of Tract 1, Kriegel's Acre Tracts; and a portion of the East 1/2 of the NW 1/4 of the SW 1/4 of the NE 1/4 of Section 36-26-3, with respect to Height District, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto one new section numbered 10-26.
